OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM.synopsis: Party finds Mizora in her pod in Moonrise Towers and chooses whether to release her or flush her down the tube. If alive, she flies off to wait for Wyll.
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM.how_to_trigger: With Wyll in party, trigger Mizora's capture in Camp or at TWN  and then approach Mizora's pod in Moonrise Towers.

individual_metadata.synopsis: Party finds Mizora in her pod in Moonrise Towers and chooses whether to release her or flush her down the tube. If alive, she flies off to wait for Wyll. Version for if Wyll is not in Party.
individual_metadata.how_to_trigger: With Wyll recruited but no in party, trigger Mizora's capture in Camp or at TWN  and then approach Mizora's pod in Moonrise Towers.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_159.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_159.text: Not yet, Mizora - it's a seller's market now. Time we struck up a new deal.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_23.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_23.text: You end it. No more pact, no more debt. Then I set you free - and you flit back to Zariel and leave me for good.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_268.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_268.text: Now why should I go letting my favourite pet off his leash?

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_213.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_213.text: How about I let the cult infect you instead? I bet you'd make a loyal thrall.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_285.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_285.text: You're free, Mizora. I held up my end. Now you hold up yours. Sever the pact.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_222.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_222.context: NodeContext: She gears up to read the contract, lots of self-please hemming and hawing leading up to it.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_95.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_95.text: Now by Graz'zt's cock, get me out of this thing.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_57.context: CinematicNodeContext: You see Mizora in her pod.NodeContext: Mizora trapped in pod

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_248.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_248.context: NodeContext: Calmly but with en edge.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_250.context: CinematicNodeContext: The party approaches a mind flayer pod. Inside is the half-devil Mizora, Wyll's patron. She pushes her hands against the transparent cover and smiles. Next to the pod is a console with two buttons on it, the 'unleash' and 'annihilate' buttons on the console in the tutorial.NodeContext: Mizora is trapped in her pod, she pushes her hands against the cover and smiles.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_83.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_83.text: By Graz'zt's cock, it's about time you came. Enough sniffing around - get me out of this thing.
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_83.context: NodeContext: Graz-its cock (quite a swear indeed). Said with only the slightest urgency. Mizora should still sound her confident self, even with her trapped inside the pod

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_160.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_160.text: I'll do it - and you'll set me free. That was the deal.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_182.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_182.text: Yeah, yeah. So get to it already.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_232.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_232.text: Not yet, Mizora - it's a seller's market now. Time we struck up a new deal.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_30.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_30.text: You end it. No more pact, no more debt. Then I set you free - and you flit back to Zariel and leave me for good.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_22.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_22.text: Now why should I go letting my favourite pet off his leash?

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_72.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_72.context: CinematicNodeContext: Laughing hysterically that a player tried a children's incantation to release themselves from a devil's contract.NodeContext: Mizora is still in her pod, laughing hysterically at the player

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_27.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_27.text: We could always let the cult infect you, I guess. I bet you'd make a loyal thrall.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_254.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_254.text: Think again. Clause Z, Section Thirteen - the 'Lemure' clause. Could've sworn we covered this.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_55.speaker: Narrator
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_55.text: *Wyll's eyes turn to the control panel next to the pod. It has two devices marked with illithid symbols.*
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_55.context: CinematicNodeContext: The camera shows the console that controls the pod.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_112.speaker: Narrator
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_112.text: *The controls are open to your tadpole's command - to your authority.*

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_126.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_126.text: Gather your strength and smash your foot through the pod.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_192.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player's fist slams against the pod and it cracks open. Mizora leaps down, and spreads her wings carefully, one after the other.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_114.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_114.text: You did all right, Wyll. I'd give your belly a good rub, but never could stand the smell.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_14.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_14.text: You're free, Mizora. I held up my end. Now you hold up yours. Sever the pact.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_203.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_203.context: NodeContext: She gears up to read the contract, lots of self-please hemming and hawing leading up to it.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_230.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_230.text: Clause Z, Section Thirteen: 'If the soul-binder consents to separation, she will release the soul-bearer from all obligation within six months.'
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_230.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sound effect on voice. Something heightened, like Galadriel in lord of the rings when she goes nuts.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_148.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_148.text: Ignorant thing. It's always the terms and conditions that get you.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_266.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_266.text: Sever the pact now, devil - or I'll sever your head.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_28.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_28.text: Not going to happen, but I do like your spunk.
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_28.context: CinematicNodeContext: Talking to player, then to Wyll.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_118.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_118.text: Fine, six months it is. What happens next?

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_6.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_6.text: Well - I imagine you have business in Moonrise to take care of. If I were you, I'd get moving.
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_6.context: CinematicNodeContext: Talking to player, then to Wyll.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_61.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_61.text: Don't you fret, I'll find you soon enough. You're going to need me. Count on it.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_227.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_227.text: Oh - and go ahead, tell your chums how we met. It's a real cracker of a tale. Ta-ta!

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_68.context: CinematicNodeContext: An infernal rune appears on the ground beneath Mizora and she sinks through it.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_196.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_196.text: Gods damn you, Wyll. You're more trouble than you're worth.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_229.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_229.text: Aw, don't be so hard on him. With his daddy issues and all, he's had a rough go.
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_229.context: CinematicNodeContext: Talking to player, then to Wyll.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_197.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_197.text: Now, you've got business in the Towers to take care of.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_166.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_166.text: You'd think we'd get a reward for going through all this trouble.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_53.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_53.text: Another one? Well - after jumping through all those hoops, a little treat wouldn't hurt.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_155.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora waves her hands in the air, fire flowing from her into Wyll. He has now been granted a special diabolical power TBD.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_235.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_235.text: All that power. And to think you want to throw it away.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_256.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_256.text: Well - after jumping through all those hoops, a little treat wouldn't hurt.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_261.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_261.text: The new contract is enough. That, and my sparkling disposition.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_215.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_215.text: My sparkling disposition will have to do.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_7.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_7.text: I've got half a mind to kill you where you stand.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_99.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_99.text: Fine, you're free. What happens next?

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_18.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_18.text: You'd think we'd get a reward for going through all this trouble.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_212.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_212.text: You've jumped through enough hoops - a little treat wouldn't hurt.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_82.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_82.text: My sparkling disposition will more than suffice.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_186.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player's fist slams against the pod but it remains intact.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_223.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_223.text: Examine the device on the left.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_234.speaker: Narrator
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_234.text: *You know this symbol from the mind flayer ship. It means 'annihilate'.*

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_220.speaker: Narrator
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_220.text: *You can make no sense of the symbol.*

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_139.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_139.text: Examine the device on the right.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_146.speaker: Narrator
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_146.text: *You recognise the marking from the nautiloid: an illithid symbol meaning 'unleash'.*

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_41.speaker: Narrator
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_41.text: *You decipher the symbol: it's an illithid sigil meaning 'unleash'.*

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_39.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_39.text: Connect your mind to the device on the left and activate it.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_210.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_210.text: Hells. What's happening? What have you -

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_36.context: CinematicNodeContext: The pod begins to kick into action.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_5.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_5.context: CinematicNodeContext:  Mizora is about to be killed in the podNodeContext: Panicking. She is about to die.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_202.context: CinematicNodeContext: A psionic surge is released. Mizora is killed (teleported to oubliette?)

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_87.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_87.context: NodeContext: Panicking. He is about to be pulled into the hells.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_60.context: CinematicNodeContext: Fire begins to engulf Wyll. He is in agony.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_175.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_175.context: NodeContext: Calling out in panic as Wyll is being pulled into the hells.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_236.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll sinks through the floor, flailing in agony, leaving behind a pile of ash, which can be looted to retrieve Wyll's belongings. He is gone for good.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_152.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_152.context: NodeContext: Incedibly upset over Wyll's fate,

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_281.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_281.text: Connect your mind to the 'annihilate' device and activate it.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_162.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_162.text: Connect your mind to the device on the right and activate it.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_64.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_64.text: Connect your mind to the 'unleash' device and activate it.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_90.context: CinematicNodeContext: Pod opens, Mizora falls out, then gets to her feet. She unfolds one wing, and then the other.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_187.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_187.text: Don't take long. They pop a tadpole in me, and the Hells'll take Wyll for good.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_132.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_132.text: Incredible - you actually think you hold the winning hand.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_31.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_31.text: Fine, I'll play your game. But I amend the pact once I'm freed - not before.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_241.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_241.text: Clause F, Section Nine: 'Soul-binder shall bestow reward or favour only upon soul-bearer's fulfilment of related obligation.'

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_275.speaker: Narrator
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_275.text: *You've heard of this provision - better known as the 'You First' clause.*

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_113.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_113.text: Remember all you can about devils and their contracts.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_156.speaker: Narrator
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_156.text: *You recall an old incantation from a children's story, said to void a devil's contract: 'Abi, diabole, et nunquam redi.'*

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_168.speaker: Narrator
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_168.text: *You can think of no way to void a devil's pact.*

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_66.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_66.text: Say you know a pact-breaking charm and chant a series of pseudo-Infernal phrases.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_101.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_101.text: I've never seen such a fearless display of sheer idiocy. Bravo!

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_15.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_15.text: Ugh - heartbreaking. I bet you thought I'd be impressed.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_0.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_0.text: I wouldn't let him go, Mizora. Wyll needs someone to keep him in line.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_10.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_10.text: I share my talents, and you reward me with this rotten tripe?

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_225.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_225.text: Turn that frown around, pup. Your chum's got all your best interests at heart.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_59.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_59.text: My dumb little stinker. Took you long enough.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_177.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_177.text: Now by Graz'zt's cock, get me out of this thing.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_106.context: CinematicNodeContext: You see Mizora in her pod.NodeContext: Mizora trapped in pod

Next to the pod is a console with two buttons on it, the 'unleash' and 'annihilate' buttons on the console in the tutorial.NodeContext: Mizora is trapped in her pod, she pushes her hands against the cover and smiles.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_9.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_9.text: By Graz'zt's cock, it's about time you came. Enough sniffing around - get me out of this thing.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_88.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_88.text: By Graz'zt's cock, it's about time you came.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_199.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_199.text: Mizora? You are the devil you sent me to rescue?

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_269.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_269.text: My dumb little stinker. Took you long enough.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_29.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_29.text: Figures. All that talk about 'Zariel's asset', I should've known you were lying.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_151.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_151.text: Why, perish the thought. Every word was nothing less than true.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_115.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_115.text: Now enough sniffing around and get me out of this thing.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_154.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_154.text: Do it, and I'll let you off your leash. A devil always keeps her promises.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_173.speaker: Narrator
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_173.text: *Mizora's life rests in your hands. Perhaps you could end this pact, here and now.*

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_255.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_255.context: CinematicNodeContext: Laughing hysterically that a player tried a children's incantation to release themselves from a devil's contract.NodeContext: Mizora is still in her pod, laughing hysterically at the player

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_141.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_141.text: How about I let the cult infect you instead? I bet you'd make a loyal thrall.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_209.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_209.text: Clause Z, Section Thirteen - the 'Lemure' clause. Could've sworn we covered this.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_103.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_103.text: Incredible - you actually think you hold the winning hand.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_272.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_272.text: Ponder the ins and outs of your contract. Could there be a loophole?

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_124.speaker: Narrator
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_124.text: *Your own contract is airtight. But you recall an old incantation from a children's story, said to void a devil's pact: 'Abi, diabole, et nunquam redi.'*

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_133.speaker: Narrator
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_133.text: *You can think of no way to void a devil's pact.*

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_128.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_128.text: Say you know a pact-breaking charm and chant a series of pseudo-Infernal phrases.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_33.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_33.text: I've never seen such a fearless display of sheer idiocy. Bravo!

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_104.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_104.text: Fine, I'll play your game. But I amend the pact once I'm freed - not before.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_240.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_240.text: Clause F, Section Nine: 'Soul-binder shall bestow reward or favour only upon soul-bearer's fulfilment of related obligation.'

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_195.speaker: Narrator
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_195.text: *Your eyes turn to the control panel next to the pod. It has two devices marked with illithid symbols. Your tadpole responds to them eagerly.*

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_181.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_181.text: Gather your strength and smash your foot through the pod.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_2.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player's fist slams against the pod and it cracks open. Mizora leaps down, and spreads her wings carefully, one after the other.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_184.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_184.text: You did all right, Wyll. I'd give your belly a good rub, but never could stand the smell.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_49.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_49.text: As for the pact - you forgot the fine print. Ahem.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_140.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_140.text: Clause Z, Section Thirteen: 'If the soul-binder consents to separation, she will release the soul-bearer from all obligation within six months.'
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_140.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sound effect on voice. Something heightened, like Galadriel in lord of the rings when she goes nuts.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_51.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_51.text: Ignorant thing. It's always the terms and conditions that get you.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_206.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_206.text: Sever the pact now, or I'll sever your head.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_65.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_65.text: Not going to happen - but I do like your spunk. Besides, you've got bigger fishes to fry.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_40.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_40.text: Fine, six months it is. What happens next?

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_62.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_62.text: Well - I imagine you have business in Moonrise to take care of.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_249.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_249.text: So that's it? All this trouble and not a single reward?

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_17.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_17.text: You've jumped through enough hoops - a little treat wouldn't hurt.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_42.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_42.text: My sparkling disposition will more than suffice.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_92.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_92.text: Now - you've got business in Moonrise to take care of.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_58.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_58.text: Don't you fret, I'll find you soon enough. You're going to need me. Count on it.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_84.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_84.text: Oh - and go ahead, tell folks how we met. It's a real cracker of a tale. Ta-ta!

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_37.context: CinematicNodeContext: An infernal rune appears on the ground beneath Mizora and she sinks through it.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_25.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_25.text: I've got half a mind to kill you where you stand.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_142.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_142.text: Fine, you're free. What happens next?

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_271.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_271.text: You'd think I'd get a reward for going through all this trouble.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_219.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player's fist slams against the pod but it remains intact.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_107.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_107.text: I'll be damned. That's the best you've got?

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_44.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_44.text: Examine the device on the left.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_91.speaker: Narrator
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_91.text: *You know this symbol from the mind flayer ship. It means 'annihilate'.*

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_165.speaker: Narrator
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_165.text: *You can make no sense of the symbol.*

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_131.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_131.text: Examine the device on the right.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_120.speaker: Narrator
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_120.text: *You recognise the marking from the nautiloid: an illithid symbol meaning 'unleash'.*

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_221.speaker: Narrator
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_221.text: *You decipher the symbol: it's an illithid sigil meaning 'unleash'.*

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_282.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_282.text: Connect your mind to the device on the left and activate it.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_164.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_164.text: Connect your mind to the 'annihilate' device and activate it.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_3.context: CinematicNodeContext: The pod begins to kick into action.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_226.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_226.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora is about to be killed in the podNodeContext: Panicking. She is about to die.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_176.context: CinematicNodeContext: A psionic surge is released. Mizora is killed (teleported to oubliette?)

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_244.speaker: Narrator
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_244.text: *The fires of Avernus roar within you. You are twisting, changing, shrinking. Your soul is forfeit to the Hells.*

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_224.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll sinks through the floor, flailing in agony, leaving behind a pile of ash, which can be looted to retrieve Wyll's belongings. He is gone for good.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_8.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_8.text: Connect your mind to the device on the right and activate it.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_190.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player telepathically connects to the device. Mizora falls out, then gets to her feet. She unfolds one wing, and then the other.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_198.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_198.text: Connect your mind to the 'unleash' device and activate it.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_262.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_262.text: Don't take long, puppy. They pop a tadpole in me, and the Hells'll have you for good.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_163.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_163.text: Ugh - heartbreaking. I bet you thought I'd be impressed.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_85.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_85.text: Poor thing. I'll let you out of there.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_21.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_21.text: Fine, let's get on with it.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_188.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_188.text: What have we here? Hold on - I need to relish the moment.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_47.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_47.text: Go on and gloat, bow to your pretend crowd.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_200.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_200.text: All done? Good. Now enough sniffing around and get me out of this thing.

57.context: CinematicNodeContext: The party approaches a mind flayer pod. Inside is the half-devil Mizora, Wyll's patron. She pushes her hands against the transparent cover and smiles. Next to the pod is a console with two buttons on it, the 'unleash' and 'annihilate' buttons on the console in the tutorial.

27.speaker: Mizora
27.text: By Graz'zt's cock, it's about time you came.
27.context: NodeContext: Graz-its cock (quite a swear indeed). Said with only the slightest urgency. Mizora should still sound her confident self, even with her trapped inside the pod

54.speaker: Player
54.text: Mizora? You are the devil you sent Wyll to rescue?

19.speaker: Mizora
19.text: Thought you'd have figured it out before now.

22.speaker: Mizora
22.text: Now enough sniffing around and get me out of this thing.

60.speaker: Mizora
60.text: Do it, and I'll let Wyll off his leash. A devil always keeps her promises.

43.speaker: Narrator
43.text: *Mizora's life rests in your hands. Perhaps you could end Wyll's pact, here and now.*

127.speaker: Mizora
127.context: NodeContext: Laughing hysterically that a player tried a children's incantation to release themselves from a devil's contract.

6.speaker: Player
6.text: Free Wyll, or I let the cult infect you. I bet you'd make a loyal thrall.

71.speaker: Mizora
71.text: Think again. Clause Z, Section Thirteen - the 'Lemure' clause. Could've sworn we covered this.

83.speaker: Mizora
83.text: You wouldn't want Wyll to get sucked into the Hells, would you?

70.speaker: Mizora
70.text: Incredible - you actually think you hold the winning hand.

88.speaker: Player
88.text: Remember all you can about devils and their contracts.

25.speaker: Narrator
25.text: *You recall an old incantation from a children's story, said to void a devil's contract: 'Abi, diabole, et nunquam redi.'*

26.speaker: Narrator
26.text: *You can think of no way to void a devil's pact.*

116.speaker: Player
116.text: Say you know a pact-breaking charm and chant a series of pseudo-Infernal phrases.

131.speaker: Mizora
131.text: I'll be damned. You want to free the pup from his pact.

17.speaker: Mizora
17.text: And you thought that idiotic display would do it? Bravo!

29.speaker: Mizora
29.text: Fine, I'll play your game. But I amend the pact once I'm freed - not before.

119.speaker: Mizora
119.text: Clause F, Section Nine: 'Soul-binder shall bestow reward or favour only upon soul-bearer's fulfilment of related obligation.'

34.speaker: Narrator
34.text: *You've heard of this provision - better known as the 'You First' clause.*

7.speaker: Narrator
7.text: *Your eyes turn to the control panel next to the pod. It has two devices marked with illithid symbols.*
7.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player turns their attention to the console that controls the pod.

67.speaker: Narrator
67.text: *The controls are open to your tadpole's command - to your authority.*

4.speaker: Player
4.text: Gather your strength and smash your foot through the pod.

48.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [reuse]  The player's fist slams against the pod and it cracks open.

Mizora steps out of the pod.

11.speaker: Mizora
11.text: Good work. I'd give you a gold star, but I'm fresh out.
11.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora steps out of the pod and leaps down

40.speaker: Mizora
40.text: As for the pact: hrm. Mm-mm-mgh-AHEM.
40.context: NodeContext: She gears up to read the contract, lots of self-please hemming and hawing leading up to it.

8.speaker: Mizora
8.text: Clause Z, Section Thirteen: 'If the soul-binder consents to separation, she will release the soul-bearer from all obligation within six months.'
8.context: NodeContext: Sound effect on voice. Something heightened, like Galadriel in lord of the rings when she goes nuts.

9.speaker: Lae'zel
9.text: Six months? Are nine Hells so few that you would make our lives a tenth?

68.speaker: Mizora
68.text: Ignorant thing. It's always the terms and conditions that get you.

129.speaker: Player
129.text: To the Hells with your conditions. Sever Wyll's pact now, or I'll sever your head.

58.speaker: Mizora
58.text: Not going to happen, but I do like your spunk.
58.context: CinematicNodeContext: Talking to player, then to Wyll.

102.speaker: Player
102.text: A full half of a year? You've got to be kidding.

24.speaker: Mizora
24.text: Dead serious. Don't let the smile fool you.

52.speaker: Player
52.text: Shrug. Six months isn't that long of a wait.

18.speaker: Player
18.text: That warlock of yours is turning out to be more trouble than he's worth.

1.speaker: Mizora
1.text: Aw, don't be so hard on him. With his daddy issues and all, he's had a rough go.
1.context: CinematicNodeContext: Talking to player, then to Wyll.

110.speaker: Mizora
110.text: Right, I'm out of here - I need a long bath. I'll leave you to your very serious business.

5.speaker: Mizora
5.text: But don't you fret. If you survive this place, I'll find you. The pup will be needing me. Count on it.

133.speaker: Mizora
133.text: Oh, and ask Wyll how we met - I've loosened his tongue. It's a real cracker of a tale. Ta-ta!

2.context: CinematicNodeContext: An infernal rune appears on the ground beneath Mizora exits in.

91.speaker: Shadowheart
91.text: Six months? We could be long dead before that long's elapsed.

59.speaker: Astarion
59.text: Six months until he's free? You little rat.

80.speaker: Gale
80.text: Six months is a trifle - you'd barely read through a single bookcase in Candlekeep in such a time.

79.speaker: Karlach
79.text: You're a disgusting little shit, you know that, Mizora?

122.speaker: Halsin
122.text: Six months? It can be done. A long life well lived will soon render it but a fleeting memory.

28.speaker: Jaheira
28.text: The limpet clings on. Young Wyll had parasite problems well before the tadpole, it seems.
28.context: NodeContext: Utter amused scorn for Mizora and all her kind - cambions are just parasites, clinging onto living souls

123.speaker: Player
123.text: I've got half a mind to kill you where you stand.

106.speaker: Mizora
106.text: Me? I'm out of here. You? I don't play tarot.

16.speaker: Mizora
16.text: My sparkling disposition will more than suffice.

21.context: CinematicNodeContext: [reuse] The player's fist slams against the pod but it remains intact.

93.speaker: Player
93.text: Examine the device on the left.

64.speaker: Narrator
64.text: *You know this symbol from the mind flayer ship. It means 'annihilate'.*

132.speaker: Narrator
132.text: *You can make no sense of the symbol.*

81.speaker: Player
81.text: Examine the device on the right.

20.speaker: Narrator
20.text: *You recognise the marking from the nautiloid: an illithid symbol meaning 'unleash'.*

128.speaker: Narrator
128.text: *You decipher the symbol: it's an illithid sigil meaning 'unleash'.*

125.speaker: Narrator
125.text: *The button's symbol means nothing to you.*

84.speaker: Player
84.text: Connect your mind to the device on the left and activate it.

3.speaker: Player
3.text: Connect your mind to the 'annihilate' device and activate it.

114.speaker: Mizora
114.text: Hells. What's happening? What have you -

109.context: CinematicNodeContext: A psionic blast is released and Mizora is killed.

96.speaker: Narrator
96.text: *Your heart burns red-hot, then goes hollow. A presence disappears from your mind.*

46.speaker: Narrator
46.text: *The Hells have taken Wyll as their own. He is lost to the fires of Avernus.*

56.speaker: Lae'zel
56.text: Gone. The Hells have claimed their prize.

85.speaker: Shadowheart
85.text: It wasn't just her fate we decided... Wyll - he belongs to the Hells now.
85.context: NodeContext: Regretful. A party member's been sent to hell, permanently.

115.speaker: Astarion
115.text: Hells. They've taken the Blade to his final frontier.

113.speaker: Gale
113.text: She's gone... and Wyll's been consigned to the Hells along with her. Farewell, Blade.

42.speaker: Karlach
42.text: Wait... what? No. This can't be. Bring him back. Bring him back NOW!

121.speaker: Halsin
121.text: She's gone... and Wyll's been dragged to the Hells in her wake. Silvanus, keep his memory.

12.speaker: Jaheira
12.text: Damnation at the flick of a switch. You cast your allies aside easily.
12.context: NodeContext: Disdain, but no blame. We've just damned a companion to the hells, and it reminds her of how easily she cast her own friend aside. She dislikes us as much as she dislikes herself.

99.speaker: Player
99.text: Connect your mind to the device on the right and activate it.

72.speaker: Player
72.text: Connect your mind to the 'unleash' device and activate it.

73.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player presses the right-side button on the console. Mizora falls out, then gets to her feet.

50.speaker: Mizora
50.text: Don't take long. They pop a tadpole in me, and the Hells'll take Wyll for good.

112.speaker: Mizora
112.text: And you figured I'd be impressed by that little display? Heartbreaking.

23.speaker: Player
23.text: Poor thing. I'll let you out of there.

95.speaker: Player
95.text: Fine, let's get on with it.

120.speaker: Player
120.text: Figures. All that talk about 'Zariel's asset', I should've known you were lying.

130.speaker: Mizora
130.text: Why, perish the thought. Every word was nothing less than true.

39.speaker: Player
39.text: What have we here? Hold on - I need to relish the moment.

103.speaker: Mizora
103.text: Go on and gloat, bow to your pretend crowd.

33.speaker: Mizora
33.text: All done? Good. Now enough sniffing around and get me out of this thing.

118.speaker: Mizora
118.context: NodeContext: Calmly but with en edge.
